trans-unit.source: Container for all extended editor logic for properties.

The <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.ExtendedPropertyValueEditor> class can hold two <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> objects, one for an inline editor and one for an extended editor.
The inline editor provides a custom interface that appears within the bounds of the `Properties` window, and the extended editor provides an interface that appears in a new window.

The <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValueEditor.InlineEditorTemplate%2A> property returns the XAML template for the visual interface for the inline editor, and the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.ExtendedPropertyValueEditor.ExtendedEditorTemplate%2A> property returns the XAML template for the extended editor.
These are typically provided in a ResourceDictionary elsewhere in the project.
You should use the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton> to invoke your custom <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.ExtendedPropertyValueEditor>.

Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.ExtendedPropertyValueEditor"></xref> class without specified extended and inline editor <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"></xref> objects.

Creates a new instance of <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.ExtendedPropertyValueEditor"></xref> with the specified extended and inline editor <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"></xref> objects.
When used, its <xref:System.Activities.ActivityContext.DataContext%2A> is set to a <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue>.
The <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"></xref> used for the extended pop-up or pinned editor.
The <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"></xref> used for the inline editor.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"></xref> used for the extended pop-up or pinned editor.
The <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"></xref> object used for the extended pop-up or pinned editor.
